Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI allows for instant feedback allowing me to more rapidly improve on my work before getting feedback from a teacher which can take time.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Receiving feedback from a teacher (or anyone) can sometimes generate negative feelings but GenAI could criticize my work without creating any negative feelings.
